content: Once the restoring process is over, you'll be automatically redirected to your {{productName}}.

comment.text: The PreparationPortalDescription translation key is used to display a message that will be shown after the restoring process is complete, informing users that they will be automatically redirected to their product name. This text appears in the UI on a screen where a progress indicator and percentage are displayed, likely on a preparation portal page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses 'Váš' which is the informal possessive pronoun. It should be 'Vaše' to maintain a formal tone, consistent with the context of a portal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po ukončení procesu obnovy, budete automaticky přesměrováni na Vaše {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation uses the formal 'usted' which might not be appropriate for all users. Consider using the informal 'tú' for a more conversational tone, or assessing the target audience to determine the correct level of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'usted será' with 'tú serás' or evaluating the appropriate formality for the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Siinä vaiheessa kun' is a rather verbose and slightly awkward way to say 'Once'. A more natural Finnish phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kun palautus on valmis, sinut siirretään automaattisesti {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses 'est terminé', which is grammatically incorrect. It should be 'est terminée' to agree with 'processus' (masculine).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Une fois le processus de restauration est terminée, vous serez automatiquement redirigé vers votre {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "redirected to your" is not accurate. "포털로 자동으로" implies redirection *to* a portal, not the user's own instance of the product.
The Polish sentence uses the masculine form 'przekierowany' (redirected) which assumes the user is male. It should be gender-neutral or use a more inclusive form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po zakończeniu procesu przywracania zostaniesz automatycznie przekierowany/a do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Uma vez que o processo de restauração tenha terminado' is grammatically a bit awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express this in Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Após a conclusão do processo de restauração, você será automaticamente redirecionado para o {{productName}}.
